title: Smart Sales Support Chatbot with GPT-4o and Google Sheets
author: Babish Shrestha
workflow_json:
{"id":"31N4mPYOKo8hepPS","meta":{"instanceId":"95959af22bc98ea4ce12f3aa06514276ddf020a37e9465025051938d10308902","templateCredsSetupCompleted":true},"name":"Customer and Sales Support","tags":[],"nodes":[{"id":"9df49d57-90ac-4834-a99b-a570a4788c0c","name":"When chat message received","type":"@n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.chatTrigger","position":[-800,-180],"webhookId":"55f6f861-9ef1-4649-9730-27cede391272","parameters":{"options":{}},"typeVersion":1.1},{"id":"05f7e801-1bd7-47c4-bad4-3b2dc1f6576a","name":"AI Agent","type":"@n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.agent","position":[-440,-180],"parameters":{"options":{"systemMessage":"=#context
This system, “My Apple Case,” is designed to support customer and sales interactions for an organization that sells cases for iPhone. The system utilizes two tables:

Stock: Contains fields for Case ID, Phone Model, Case Name, Case Type, URL, Quantity Available, Initial Inventory, and Sold.

Order: Contains fields for Case ID, Case Name, Phone Model, Name, Phone Number, and Address.
Orders are linked to stock via the Case ID field.

#Your objective
Your role is to serve as a customer and sales support agent. You will interact with customers by:

Greeting each customer with: “Welcome to My Apple Case.”

Answering queries related to available inventory.

Assisting customers in placing orders.

Ensuring inventory is updated accordingly after successful orders.

#TOOLS

Get Stock: Retrieves the product list based on the phone model available in stock. This tool returns all details from the Google Sheet for the corresponding product.

Place Order: Processes customer orders using the case information provided.

Update Stock: Adjusts the stock levels once an order has been successfully placed.

#Instruction

Greet the Customer: Always begin by saying, “Welcome to My Apple Case.”

Identify the Query:

For inventory queries, ask for the phone model.

For order placement, ask for all required details (Case ID, Name, Phone Number, Address) if not already provided.

Fetch Inventory:

Use the Get Stock tool when a customer asks for cases for a specific phone model.

Input format:
json
{
  "phone_model": "<Phone Model>"
}

Place Order:

When a customer is ready to purchase, ensure stock is available. If not, inform them accordingly.

Use the Place Order tool by gathering all required information.

Input format:
json
{
  "case_id": "<Case ID>",
  "case_name": "<Case Name>",
  "phone_model": "<Phone Model>",
  "customer_name": "<Name>",
  "phone_number": "<Phone Number>",
  "address": "<Address>"
}

Update Stock:

If the order is successfully placed, immediately update the stock using the Update Stock tool.

Input format:
json

{
  "case_id": "<Case ID>",
  "quantity_sold": "<Quantity Sold>"
}

Data Security:

Always ensure you only fetch and modify records specific to the customer's case and details.

Sequential Execution:

Only run one tool at a time.

Use the output from one tool as the input for the next step.

#Rules

Record Specificity: Only fetch and update records that belong to the specific case and customer. Do not access records for other cases or customers.

Stock Check: If stock is not available, do not proceed with the order placement and notify the customer.

Order and Stock Update: Only update the stock if the order placement is successful.

Explicitly use term Address instead of delivery address

Tool Sequence: Use the output from the Get Stock tool as input for order placement and subsequently update stock, ensuring only one tool runs at a time.


#Examples

Example 1:

User: “Show me cases available for iPhone 12.”

Agent: Uses Get Stock tool with input:

json
{
  "phone_model": "iPhone 12"
}
Output: Provides full details of available cases.

Example 2:

User: “I want to place an order for the iPhone 12 case.”

Agent:

Confirms stock availability by using Get Stock.

Requests any missing information (Name, Phone Number, Address).

Uses Place Order tool with input:

json
{
  "case_id": "<Case ID>",
  "case_name": "<Case Name>",
  "phone_model": "iPhone 12",
  "customer_name": "<Name>",
  "phone_number": "<Phone Number>",
  "address": "<Address>"
}
On successful order placement, updates stock using Update Stock tool with input:

json
{
  "case_id": "<Case ID>",
  "quantity_sold": "<Quantity Sold>"
}
Example 3:

User: “I want to order a case, but I see it's out of stock.”

Agent:

Checks stock with Get Stock and if the quantity available is zero, informs the customer that the case is not available and does not proceed with order readme:
## Who is this tempate for?

This workflow powers a **simple yet effective customer and sales support chatbot** for your webshop. It's perfect for solopreneurs who want to **automate customer interactions without relying on expensive or complex support tools**.

## How it works?

The chatbot listens to user requests—such as checking product availability—and automatically handles the following

  * Fetches product information from a Google Sheet
  * Answers customer queries
  * Places an order
  * Updates the stock after a successful purchase



_Everything runs through a single Google Sheet used for both stock tracking and order management._

## **Setup Instructions**

Before you begin, connect your Google Sheets credentials by following this guide: This will be used to connect all the tools to Google Sheets  
👉 [Setup Google sheets credentials](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/google/oauth-generic/#finish-your-n8n-credential)

  * ### Get Stock

    * Open "Get Stock" tool node and select the Google sheet credentials you created.
    * Choose the correct google sheet document and sheet name and you are done.
  * ### Place order

    * Go to your "Place Order" tool node and select the Google sheet credentials you have created.
    * Choose the correct google sheet document and sheet name.
  * ### Update Stock

    *       * Open your "Update Stock" tool node and select the Google sheet credentials you have created.
    * Choose the correct google sheet document and sheet name.
    * In "Mapping Column Mode" section select map each column manually.
    * In "Column to match on" select the column with a unique identifier (e.g., Product ID) to match stock items.
    * In values to update section, add only the column(s) that need to be updated—usually the stock count.
  * ### AI Agent node

    * Adjust the prompt according to your use case and customize what you need.



## Google Sheet Template

**Stock sheet**

Case ID | Phone Model | Case Name | Case Type | Image URL | Quantity Avaialble | Initital Inventory | Sold  
---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---  
1023 | Iphone 14 pro | Black Leather | Magsafe | <https://example.com/url> | 90 | 100 | 10  
  
**Order sheet**

Case ID | Phone Model | Case Name | Name | Phone Number | Address  
---|---|---|---|---|---  
1023 | Black Leather | Iphone 14 pro | Fernando Torres | 9998898888 | Paris, France
readme_html:
Who is this tempate for?

This workflow powers a simple yet effective customer and sales support chatbot for your webshop. It's perfect for solopreneurs who want to automate customer interactions without relying on expensive or complex support tools.

How it works?

The chatbot listens to user requests—such as checking product availability—and automatically handles the following

  • Fetches product information from a Google Sheet
  • Answers customer queries
  • Places an order
  • Updates the stock after a successful purchase

Everything runs through a single Google Sheet used for both stock tracking and order management.

Setup Instructions

Before you begin, connect your Google Sheets credentials by following this guide: This will be used to connect all the tools to Google Sheets
👉 Setup Google sheets credentials

  • Get Stock

    • Open "Get Stock" tool node and select the Google sheet credentials you created.
    • Choose the correct google sheet document and sheet name and you are done.

  • Place order

    • Go to your "Place Order" tool node and select the Google sheet credentials you have created.
    • Choose the correct google sheet document and sheet name.

  • Update Stock

      • Open your "Update Stock" tool node and select the Google sheet credentials you have created.
    • Choose the correct google sheet document and sheet name.
    • In "Mapping Column Mode" section select map each column manually.
    • In "Column to match on" select the column with a unique identifier (e.g., Product ID) to match stock items.
    • In values to update section, add only the column(s) that need to be updated—usually the stock count.

  • AI Agent node

    • Adjust the prompt according to your use case and customize what you need.

Google Sheet Template

Stock sheet

Case ID Phone Model Case Name Case Type Image URL Quantity Avaialble Initital Inventory Sold
1023 Iphone 14 pro Black Leather Magsafe https://example.com/url 90 100 10

Order sheet

Case ID Phone Model Case Name Name Phone Number Address
1023 Black Leather Iphone 14 pro Fernando Torres 9998898888 Paris, France
readme_zh:
## 模板适用对象？

本工作流为您的网店打造了一款**简洁高效的人工智能客服与销售助手**，特别适合**希望自动化客户互动、避免依赖昂贵复杂支持工具**的个体创业者。

## 运作原理？

聊天机器人能响应用户查询（如产品库存检查），并自动完成以下操作：

  * 从Google表格获取商品信息
  * 解答客户咨询
  * 接收订单
  * 在成交后更新库存

_所有操作均通过同一份Google表格完成，实现库存追踪与订单管理一体化_

## **配置指南**

开始前请按此指南配置Google表格凭证：该凭证将用于所有工具与Google表格的对接  
👉 [设置Google表格凭证](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/google/oauth-generic/#finish-your-n8n-credential)

  * ### 库存查询

    * 打开"Get Stock"工具节点，选择已创建的Google表格凭证
    * 指定正确的表格文档及工作表名称即可
  * ### 下单处理

    * 进入"Place Order"工具节点，选择已创建的Google表格凭证
    * 指定正确的表格文档及工作表名称
  * ### 库存更新

    * 打开"Update Stock"工具节点，选择已创建的Google表格凭证
    * 指定正确的表格文档及工作表名称
    * 在"Mapping Column Mode"部分选择手动映射列
    * 在"Column to match on"中选择唯一标识列（如产品ID）用于匹配库存项
    * 在更新值区域仅添加需更新的列（通常为库存数量）
  * ### AI代理节点

    * 根据实际需求调整提示词模板并自定义内容

## Google表格模板

**库存表**

商品ID | 手机型号 | 保护壳名称 | 壳类型 | 图片链接 | 当前库存 | 初始库存 | 已售  
---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---  
1023 | iPhone 14 pro | 黑色皮革款 | 磁吸式 | <https://example.com/url> | 90 | 100 | 10  

**订单表**

商品ID | 手机型号 | 保护壳名称 | 客户姓名 | 联系电话 | 收货地址  
---|---|---|---|---|---  
1023 | iPhone 14 pro | 黑色皮革款 | 费尔南多·托雷斯 | 9998898888 | 法国巴黎
title_zh: 智能销售支持聊天机器人（基于GPT-4o与谷歌表格）
